page.title: 18THE AUTOMOBILE ASSOCIATION
page.content:
NATIONAL HEADQUARTERS, STANMORE The AA has about 7 million members. It provides them with many services, including route maps, publishing, hotel classification, communications, direct selling, legal representation, vehicle inspection, breakdown/rescue. These are co-ordinated in Stanmore.
BREAKDOWN/RESCUE SERVICE 3200 Road Service Staff operate 2780 vehicles of many kinds. These are supported by 28 Breakdown Information Centres, 67 emergency telephone numbers, 130 Road Service Centres, 860 Roadside Telephones and 7 Motorway Information Centres. Every year, 2.5 million breakdowns, 250,000 relay recoveries, 330,000 home start calls, 70,000 temporary road signs, 50,000 vehicle inspections and 130,000 technical queries are dealt with.
